title: How can I level up my honor?
body:
I'm still level 2. Do I need to get 3 honors in one match to level up at lvl 3?
And if I am level 2 I'll be able to get chests or keys? 

Please answer

replies.body: Apparently it should take weeks or months of honour until you reach the next level so you just have to be patient

Bloody better not take months, Me and** 4 other friends** have been playing **every night** and giving each other Honours every game, But** not a single one** of us have levelled up to 3 yet, Its starting to get beyond a joke, We have about _**300+ Honours each**_ and we still haven't seen a single person on level 3 yet, Even outside our group, This system is seeming worse and worse the more i find out about it :P
{{champion:30}}  {{champion:223}} {{champion:98}}

You do realize Riot Games literaly said that constant honoring eachother in premade games wont make any progress for your honor level? (Need quote here, too lazy to search for it myself)

Edit: Yep, it's in the FAQ ( https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/115008474148-Honor-FAQ )

"Can I game the system and boost to level 5 by constantly playing with a premade and honoring each other every game?

That’s a great idea. Luckily, we’ve broken a few systems in our day, too. So we specifically built Honor so potential exploits like this give you (and your friend) literally no benefit."

To be clear, you are *always* progressing towards the next Honour level (except, perhaps, if you are currently pushing through a punishment). There's no real way to know how long it will take to reach the next level, you don't even need to earn Honours to progress (they just speed it up a little).

> And if I am level 2 I'll be able to get chests or keys?

Definitely. Chests are unrelated to the Honour system, and still based on receiving an S grade as a champion you've not yet received a chest for. Keys can be acquired at the normal rate as long as you are level 2 or above, so you'll be fine as long as you don't get punished.

You can check the Honour [FAQ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/115008474148) for more info.
I can take keys even if I lose now or not?
Yep! You don't have to win to get keys!

Sometimes after you finish a game or log onto the client you will get a pleasant surprise of one or two key fragments. These have the same pop up effects as when they used to drop after games so you wont miss them!
